component.name: Range Slider
component.description: A flexible range slider component for selecting single or multiple values within defined ranges. Features dual handles, custom step sizes, value labels, and smooth animations. Supports vertical and horizontal orientations with full keyboard accessibility.

variants.name: Minimal Vertical
variants.description: A modern range slider implementation with clear visual indicators, smooth animations, responsive behavior, and accurate value feedback. Provides precise value selection with helpful visual feedback indicators and intuitive handle manipulation for seamless user interaction experience.

variants.name: Glassmorphism Dual
variants.description: Range Slider implementation in Glassmorphism Dual style

variants.name: Bootstrap Price Filter
variants.description: Range Slider implementation in Bootstrap Price Filter style

variants.name: Material Brightness
variants.description: Range Slider implementation in Material Brightness style

variants.name: Neumorphism Volume
variants.description: Range Slider implementation in Neumorphism Volume style
